document.full_text: around 40,500 infantino troy activity trucks in the united states and 1,900 in canada have been voluntarily recalled due to a choking risk, the two governments said on monday.
document.title: troy activity trucks carry choking risk: government agencies
lines_and_colors: around 40,500 infantino troy activity trucks in the united states and 1,900 in canada have been voluntarily recalled due to a choking risk, the two governments said on monday.
